name: core-registry-api
description: Combined Carbon Core Registry API Application

scripts.test: concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on $CADT_HOST && wait-on $EXPLORER_HOST && wait-on $TOKENIZATION_ENGINE_HOST && jest"
scripts.test-dev: concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on localhost:31310 && wait-on localhost:31313 && wait-on localhost:31311 && cross-env CADT_HOST=localhost && cross-env EXPLORER_HOST=localhost && cross-env TOKENIZATION_ENGINE_HOST=localhost && jest"
scripts.create-win-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node20-win-x64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-mac-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node20-macos-x64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-mac-arm64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node20-macos-arm64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-linux-x64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node20-linux-x64 --out-path dist
scripts.create-linux-arm64-dist: npm run prepare-binary && pkg package.json -t node20-linux-arm64 --out-path dist

author: Michael Taylor
